00030 class TranscoderWrapper {
00031 private:
00036      static const int kBlockSize = 1024 * 16;
00037 
00038      // The maximum size of a character in the current encoding.
00039      static unsigned int sMaxCharSize;
00040 
00042      static XMLTranscoder* sTranscoder;
00043 
00044 public:
00053      static void setEncoding(const XMLCh* encoding, unsigned int maxCharSize) {
00054           sMaxCharSize = maxCharSize;
00055           XMLTransService::Codes res;
00056           XMLTranscoder* tmp = XMLPlatformUtils::fgTransService->makeNewTranscoderFor(encoding, res, kBlockSize);
00057           if (sTranscoder) {
00058                delete sTranscoder;
00059           }
00060           sTranscoder = tmp;
00061      }
00062      
00071      static void setEncoding(const char* encoding, unsigned int maxCharSize) {
00072           sMaxCharSize = maxCharSize;
00073           XMLTransService::Codes res;
00074           XMLTranscoder* tmp = XMLPlatformUtils::fgTransService->makeNewTranscoderFor(encoding, res, kBlockSize);
00075           if (sTranscoder) {
00076                delete sTranscoder;
00077           }
00078           sTranscoder = tmp;
00079      }
00080      
00086      static XMLTranscoder* getTranscoder() { return sTranscoder; }
00087 
00093      static unsigned int getBlockSize() { return kBlockSize; }
00094 
00101      static unsigned int getMaxCharSize() { return sMaxCharSize; }
00102 };

00115 class StrX {
00116 private :
00118      static const unsigned int kBlock = 256;
00119 
00121      char mStr[kBlock];
00122 
00127      char* mLongStr;
00128      
00129 public :
00135      StrX(const XMLCh* const toTranscode) : mLongStr(0) {
00136           int maxCharSize = TranscoderWrapper::getMaxCharSize();
00137           unsigned int charsEaten;
00138           unsigned int charsToTranscode = XMLString::stringLen(toTranscode) + 1;
00139           if (charsToTranscode <= kBlock / maxCharSize) {
00140                TranscoderWrapper::getTranscoder()->transcodeTo(toTranscode,
00141                                                                charsToTranscode,
00142                                                                (XMLByte*)mStr,
00143                                                                kBlock,
00144                                                                charsEaten,
00145                                                                XMLTranscoder::UnRep_RepChar);
00146           }
00147           else {
00148                mLongStr = new char[charsToTranscode * sizeof(XMLCh)];
00149                unsigned int chunkSize;
00150                char* writeHere = mLongStr;
00151                unsigned int readBytes;
00152                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < charsToTranscode; i += charsEaten) {
00153                     chunkSize = (charsToTranscode - i < TranscoderWrapper::getBlockSize() ? 
00154                                  charsToTranscode - i : TranscoderWrapper::getBlockSize());
00155                     readBytes = TranscoderWrapper::getTranscoder()->transcodeTo(toTranscode + i,
00156                                                                                 chunkSize,
00157                                                                                 (XMLByte*)writeHere,
00158                                                                                 (charsToTranscode - i) * maxCharSize,
00159                                                                                 charsEaten,
00160                                                                                 XMLTranscoder::UnRep_RepChar);
00161                     writeHere += readBytes;
00162                }
00163           }
00164      }
00165 
00169      ~StrX() {
00170           if (mLongStr) {
00171                delete [] mLongStr;
00172           }
00173      }
00174      
00180      const char* str() const { return (mLongStr ? mLongStr : mStr); }
00181 
00188      bool operator == (const char *str) { return (strcmp(this->str(), str) == 0); }
00189 
00190      // Friends
00192      friend std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const StrX &s) { return o << s.str(); }
00194      friend Error        &operator << (Error &e, const StrX &s)  { return e << s.str(); }
00195 };
00196 
00207 class XStr {
00208 private:
00210      static const unsigned int kBlock = 256;
00211 
00213      XMLCh mStr[kBlock];
00214 
00219      XMLCh* mLongStr;
00220 
00222      unsigned char mNumBytesPerChar[kBlock];
00223 
00230      void transcode(const char* const toTranscode) {
00231           if (mLongStr) {
00232                delete [] mLongStr;
00233           }
00234           unsigned int bytesEaten;
00235           unsigned int bytesToTranscode = strlen(toTranscode) + 1;
00236           if (bytesToTranscode <= kBlock) {
00237                mLongStr = 0;
00238                TranscoderWrapper::getTranscoder()->transcodeFrom((XMLByte*)toTranscode,
00239                                                                  bytesToTranscode,
00240                                                                  mStr,
00241                                                                  kBlock,
00242                                                                  bytesEaten,
00243                                                                  mNumBytesPerChar);
00244           }
00245           else {
00246                mLongStr = new XMLCh[bytesToTranscode];
00247                unsigned char* numBytesPerChar = new unsigned char[bytesToTranscode];
00248                XMLCh* writeHere = mLongStr;
00249                unsigned int readChars;
00250                unsigned int chunkSize;
00251                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bytesToTranscode; i += bytesEaten) {
00252                     chunkSize = (bytesToTranscode - i < TranscoderWrapper::getBlockSize() ? 
00253                                  bytesToTranscode - i : TranscoderWrapper::getBlockSize());
00254                     readChars = TranscoderWrapper::getTranscoder()->transcodeFrom((XMLByte*)(toTranscode + i),
00255                                                                                   chunkSize,
00256                                                                                   writeHere,
00257                                                                                   bytesToTranscode - i,
00258                                                                                   bytesEaten,
00259                                                                                   numBytesPerChar);
00260                     writeHere += readChars;
00261                }
00262           }
00263      }
00264 
00265 public:
00272      XStr(const char* const toTranscode) : mLongStr(0) {
00273           transcode(toTranscode);
00274      }
00281      XStr(const std::string toTranscode) : mLongStr(0) {
00282           transcode(toTranscode.c_str());
00283      }
00284 
00288      ~XStr() {
00289           if (mLongStr) {
00290                delete [] mLongStr;
00291           }
00292      }
00293 
00299      const XMLCh* str() const { return (mLongStr ? mLongStr : mStr); }
00300 };
